Our Team

A professionally managed company, we are led by a team with experience and technical competence who bring their shared vision of delivering value to our customers and all stakeholders. The entrepreneurial spirit combined with a strong process-oriented approach is reflected in the ethos of the company. A bunch of dedicated professionals committed to make an impact on the society have come together to form this venture.


Nagraj HT (MCA Degree, Mysore University) acts as the spearhead of the group and leads Micromedia with a clear objective to provide solutions to various industries. He comes with more than 5 years of experience in application development for various sectors. He holds an MCA degree from Mysore University.

Company has a set of professionals and business analysts who interact with the clients to understand their business and deliver the best solution possible in the industry.

Company adheres to the industry standards and makes sure that the delivery is in sync with time and quality.

Global Solutions

Micromedia is a cutting edge application development IT Company which believes in delivering value to its customers. With more than 5 years of experience in servicing clients of various levels and domains, Micromedia has set a simple goal of making its customers life easy.

We will help in understanding your business and our applications will help in growing your business to new level. Our applications have capabilities of storage and data retrieval.

With us, you have the opportunity to spread your business to new horizons. Our experts will assist you in choosing the most suitable service or product from our repertoire for your business, and also suggest you ways in making the most out of your efforts.

Vision

To deliver best in Industry solutions in the most efficient manner.

Mission

To be a leader in providing business solutions and be a learning organization. We will work towards becoming a respectable company among customers with the sole objective of delivering cutting edge technology to the customers and partners.
